name: The Primordial World: Starting by Taking the Minghe as My Adopted Stepdaughter
author: AC.QQ
content: Yang Li, a modern man, finds himself crossing into the Primordial World, where destiny takes unexpected turns. What starts as an ordinary journey soon becomes legendary as he outwits celestial beings, subdues sages, and rescues the world from catastrophe. A story of wit, power, and unshakable determination awaits!
